document_data.preceded_by: The City That Should Not Be
document_data.mainbody:
Frozen Whispers, designed by Greg Marks and Shawn Banerjee, is an adventure in the Dreams of the Red Wizards storyline published for the Adventurers League. It is the second part of The Cold Dark series.
|
Airavat • Amri Thistlebrick • Remallia Haventree • Salros Eventide • Shadow in the Ice • The Painter • Soggy Wren • Zehira Deryan
